interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Higher Education Skincare: Goal Digger - Silky Moisturizing Cucumber Creme; formulated for dry and sensitive skin; cucumber extract; natural extract: melon, kale, cabbage, ginger, turmeric - 1.7 fl oz
Review Date: 2020/07/06
Store: Higher Education
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Item Form': 'Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 2.13 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381032050'}
Review Text: This is one of the most refreshing moisturizers I have tried, and I really like this one a lot!  It is very creamy and pale green in color, goes on smooth, and has a wonderful cucumber smell, but is much more subtle and not overpowering.  I have very dry skin, so am very happy that this moisturizer applies easily and absorbs into the skin very well.  It definitely makes dry skin look more alive.  Definitely a 5 star moisturizer!
Review Title: Wonderful cucumber scent
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Type:** Prefers products suitable for dry and sensitive skin.
- **Product Preferences:** Enjoys creamy moisturizers that are refreshing and hydrating, particularly those with natural extracts.
- **Scent Preference:** Appreciates subtle, refreshing scents, notably cucumber, without being overpowering.
- **Application Experience:** Values smooth application and good absorption, enhancing skin vitality.
- **Quality Expectations:** Prioritizes high-quality products with effective results, as indicated by a high rating given to products.
- **Brand Affinity:** Shows a preference for brands that focus on skin health and natural ingredients.

Overall, this user seeks moisturizers that deliver significant hydration while providing a pleasant sensory experience, aligning with their skincare needs and preferences for gentle, natural formulations.
